Name: Aragorn
Text: I think that was the last of them. Though this only just the entrance.

Name: Aragorn
Text: I can't imagine what lays further in the catacombs of these ruins.

Name: Aragorn
Text: This is going to be a tiresome ordeal but I must continue for Celestina.

Name: Aragorn
Text: Okay just got to keep moving forward. Lets see what lies ahead.
